text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

translation.en: Indeed, Allah is Knower of the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and earth. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts
translation.id: Sungguh, Allah mengetahui yang gaib (tersembunyi) di langit dan di bumi. Sungguh, Dia Maha Mengetahui segala isi hati
